item.title: [Python] The result of having Mr. COTOHA summarize My memories of Mentos and Go. With COTOHA fastest tutorial
item.description: # Memories of Mentos and Go Mentos has a deep feeling. At that time, I was participating in a Go club, Playing a Go stone to drop the opponent’s Go stone He was playing “shooting Go”. Heian nobles must have been entertaining, The club president, who couldn’t understand the naive play, went mad. According to him, the important go stone breaks, so stop it. Go stones cannot be fixed if they break.
